description: Try our easy to follow Daly Potato Bacon & Dijon Potato Salad With Chargrilled Chicken recipe. Absolutely delicious with the best ingredients from Woolworths.
keywords: Potato salad,Seafood free,Soy free,Wheat free,Gluten free,Tree nut free,Chicken,Sesame free,Easter,Peanut free
name: Daly Potato Bacon & Dijon Potato Salad With Chargrilled Chicken Recipe | Woolworths

recipeInstructions.text: Lightly pound one chicken breast at a time in a plastic bag to achieve even thickness.
Season with salt and pepper to taste in a bowl and drizzle with olive oil, fold to coat, let sit for 5 minutes to marinate.

Cook chicken serving side down on a preheated char grill for 3-5 minutes (depending on thickness of chicken) turning 1/2 way through initial cook. Turn over and complete cooking on other side approx. 3-5 minutes, let rest in a warm area.
Place carrots into a seasoned pot of boiling water and cook until tender. Add beans in with carrots, wait 1 minute, then strain.
Put carrots and beans back into pot and stir in butter.
Divide Daly Potato Salad onto plate, place beans and carrots neatly next to salad.
Slice each breast into 3 pieces and lay over carrots and beans, spoon left over melted butter.
